page.title: 09CHANGES IN THE LAST DECADE
page.content: {CHANGES IN THE LAST TEN YEARS} New houses have been built including a small estate of 20 houses, called Barton Bridge.Each house has four bedrooms,bathroom,lounge,dining room kitchen with utility area and gas central heating.North Sea Gas has been introduced into the village.A new Health centre and Junior School has been built.The Beaufort Hotel originally an old coaching inn has been extended and a sports club opened.A local garage owner built a car showroom and a Ford agency was granted.A stationers uses a computer for customers bills.A butcher has installed an abattoir,a Spar grocery shop now also sells hardware goods. Some inhabitants of Raglan joined the Gwent Trust for Nature Conservation.
